meta.heroTitle: Customisable UL Listed Push Buttons and Key Switch
meta.heroDescription: Build this UL listed, ADA Compliant, multipurpose push buttons to your specifications. The unique, patented design for the push buttons help dramatically stop accidental activation. Available in six colours, ten button activation choices, with or without a protective cover and in any language to accommodate most applications. All Stopper Stations are supplied with a Universal Mounting Plate as standard. For certain button activations, additional surface back box kits are required.
